function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of SVI to predict community vulnerability and health risks due to COVID-19","Impact":"Misinterpretation of vulnerability and health risks, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Incorporate multiple data sources to validate SVI findings and consult with public health experts for interpretation.","Technologies":"Data integration tools, public health modeling software.","People":"Community members, public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Mismatch between survey and geo-location data in capturing demographic variables","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of social vulnerability and health risks.","Mitigation":"Ensure alignment and consistency between survey and geo-location data collection methods and variables.","Technologies":"Geospatial data integration platforms, survey validation tools.","People":"Survey administrators, data analysts, geospatial specialists.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions."},{"Description":"Link between park use patterns and park access/proximity","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding in accessible parks.","Mitigation":"Implement park use guidelines, promote use of less crowded parks, and improve park access in underserved areas.","Technologies":"Park usage tracking systems, geospatial analysis tools.","People":"Park administrators, urban planners, local government officials.","Owner":"City and municipal authorities."}]}
